name: TrailerChix, LLC
overview:
TrailerChix develops branded and custom content to create the global go-to portal for living fabulously in small eco friendly footprints.

Now airing on the Fox and ABC networks of over 20 million households, GalleyChix is the first of 12 video titles to air. This along with reach readers in over 57 countries have become significant milestones for 2012.

TrailerChix addresses a gap in a market with an economic impact of over $171 billion in the US:

RV Industry:

  • face aging market
  • fragmented
  • slow to change

Small space market:

  • fragmented
  • wide demographics
  • under-represented
  • wide range of habitat interests

With the video production coupled with a strong online presence, TrailerChix is poised to support advertisers with an end-to-end solution across mobile, broadcast TV, web TV, experiential, social and e-commerce.
